title: Sustainable Agriculture: A Better Way to Feed The World? | A Thrivable Life Podcast | Episode 05

tasks.task: Participate in a podcast discussion on sustainable agriculture.
subtasks: Listen to the podcast host and guest introduce themselves and the topic.
Understand the definition of sustainable agriculture.
Recognize the influence of personal background on career choices.
Identify challenges faced by farmers transitioning to sustainable agriculture.
Discuss the impact of commercial farming on the environment.
Analyze the role of technology in supporting sustainable agriculture.
Explore practices farmers use to become more sustainable.
Discuss the benefits of local and community-based agriculture.
Reflect on the challenges of meeting global food demand sustainably.
Consider the role of policy and consumer choices in promoting sustainable agriculture.
Contribute to a conversation on the importance of sustainable practices in agriculture.
